hackathon-description-text: This 12 hour event will see teams of up to 4 people, make, break, play, and share games.
hackathon-eligibility: Entrants must have an Eventbrite ticket for the event.
hackathon-rules: The aim of the Game Gig is to create a fun, exciting, original game from scratch in less than 12 hours. We've created a few simple rules to help the process go smoothly for everyone.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The team that makes the best game gets this prize!
The team that makes, what is rated as the third best game, wins this prize!
The team that gets the most votes from their peers wins this prize.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: What the hell were you smoking?

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=William Gates Building, 15 JJ Thomson Ave, Cambridge CB3 0FD, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Games will be judged on how fun they are, or at least, what our judges find fun. ;)

hackathon-location-address: William Gates Building, 15 JJ Thomson Ave, Cambridge CB3 0FD, UK

hackathon-location-description: William Gates Building, University of Cambridge
